## CallMessage class

CallMessage API is in beta.

Provides access to information about a callMessage, including the call message content, contentType, messageType, and voiceEventSid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CallMessage extends EventEmitter 
```
<b>Extends:</b> EventEmitter

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `CallMessage` class.

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getContent()](./voice-react-native-sdk.callmessage_class.getcontent_method.md) |  | Get the content body of the message. |
|  [getContentType()](./voice-react-native-sdk.callmessage_class.getcontenttype_method.md) |  | Get the MIME type for the message. |
|  [getMessageType()](./voice-react-native-sdk.callmessage_class.getmessagetype_method.md) |  | Get the message type. |
|  [getSid()](./voice-react-native-sdk.callmessage_class.getsid_method.md) |  | Get the message SID. |
